Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Reroute at Damen/Irving Park
ShortDescription: 50 Damen  buses are temporarily rerouted via: Damen, Irving Park, Western, Montrose and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/Irving Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#50 Damen  buses are temporarily rerouted via: Damen, Irving Park, Western, Montrose and Damen due to, street blockage near Damen/Irving Park.

Allow extra travel time.
